description.diamond-pearl:

the foe. It prevents
sleep by making its
ability Insomnia.

effect.full:
Changes the target's ability to insomnia.

If the target's ability is truant or multitype, this move will fail.
effect.shortEffect: Changes the target's ability to Insomnia.
